name: English
card.about: I'm an 18-year-old junior programmer, enthusiastic designer, and first rank electrician. I'm a fourth-year engineering student.
h1.enjoy: This is the EtherCD developer's portfolio. Enjoy!
can.title: I can work with
can.graphics.0: I've worked with webgl, pixi.js, ctx, and sfml. I can create animations, render for games, and optimize rendering. I created UI in webgl using shaders and SVG. You can see my experience on the
can.connections.0: I understand network connections and data transfer optimization. I can effectively work with binary protocols, including protobuf, and I developed a binary protocol called LWF for the game.
can.integrations.0: I worked on integrating zig into node.js and integrating modifications within my
can.integrations.1: I developed my own solutions for runtime connection and module loading.
projects.lwf.about: Lightweight Format - A very compact, compression friendly, binary format for storing JSON like objects.
projects.lwf.tooltip: I created a format standard. I used my own developments to reduce the size of numbers and fractions (compact variant, fraction encoding).
projects.pb.about: A place where you can compete for a spot on the canvas with other players
projects.pb.tooltip: A project that brings players together for the sake of creativity. Using zustand, preact, and pixi.js technologies.
projects.mae.about: Addon for Mystical Agriculture, adds new crop types and other ideas...
projects.mae.tooltip: Experience working with other people's code and integration.
